sn4.16:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ upādāya bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṃseti.
sn4.16:4.3: Te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti.
sn4.16:5.2: “ayaṃ kho samaṇo gotamo pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ upādāya bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṃseti.
sn4.16:5.3: Te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti.
sn4.16:5.4: Yannūnāhaṃ yena samaṇo gotamo tenupasaṅkameyyaṃ vicakkhukammāyā”ti.
sn4.16:6.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā pattā abbhokāse nikkhittā honti.
sn4.16:6.2: Atha kho māro pāpimā balībaddavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā yena te pattā tenupasaṅkami.
sn4.16:6.3: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn4.16:6.5: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn4.16:6.7: Māro eso pāpimā tumhākaṃ vicakkhukammāya āgato”ti.
sn4.16:6.8: Atha kho bhagavā “māro ayaṃ pāpimā” iti viditvā māraṃ pāpimantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
